duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative customer service support, assisting customers with insurance-related inquiries, billing questions, policy changes, and use of online platforms.
Obtain and maintain a Personal Lines Property & Casualty (P&C) License as part of the training and a requirement for the role.
Communicate with internal and external customers about intermediate underwriting guidelines, policies, and marketing initiatives to service customer accounts.
Utilize competencies and skills to provide a positive customer experience, identifying gaps in coverage and upselling products.
Proactively share knowledge and provide a positive customer experience, adapting to each customer's needs and efficiently solving problems.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Four-year college degree preferred). Completion of required additional training.
